Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_chub9afg&referenceId=1_chub9afg&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Edison Investment Research

Description: Legalisation, increasing acceptance of and growing demand for pharmaceutical and consumer products mean the cannabinoids industry is booming. Will biosynthesis take it to new heights?Writer and journalist Vivienne Parry speaks to Randy Baron of Pinnacle Associates, Roy Lipski of Creo, Trevor Peters of Willow Biosciences and Nick Davis of Memery Crystal as they discuss the opportunity for investors and how biosynthesis will affect the direction of cannabinoids.This is the cannabinoids conversation you won’t want to miss.Please click here to watch video: https://www.edisongroup.com/edison-tv/could-cannabinoid-biosynthesis-be-the-next-big-thing-for-investors/
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3FtFv71
